data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prakash, Sanjeevi, Baeza, J. Antonio (2017): A new species of Lysmata Risso, 1816 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Lysmatidae) from the Gulf of Mexico. Zootaxa 4363 (4): 576-582, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4363.4.10|2 occurrences
